Buying that soundtrack you are supporting our future games, products and work. Thanks for support!

Please write a soundtrack review if you like it that will help our product too.


The Mims Beginning soundtrack:

Number of tracks: 26
Total length: 33 min 54 sec
Contains also video with soundtrack and screenshots from levels that was inspiration to make certain tracks.

Soundtrack composed and produced by Krzysztof Kowal
Choir: Monika Słaby


2016
